nodes.text: Emperor's Demonstration Team was a specialized part of the Imperial Military. Lieutenant Grond, an aide to Colonel Dyer in charge of coordinating scout actions, was among the task force's former members by the Battle of Endor in 4 ABY. A stormtrooper scout named Misik wished to be promoted to the ranks of the unit.
Emperor's Demonstration Team was mentioned in the flavor text of two cards from the Star Wars Customizable Card Game's Endor Limited expansion set, released in 1999.
